about.name: slantsc
about.caption: Allow to combine slanted and italic with small capitals.

description.abstract: This package enables the use of small capitals in different font shapes, e.g., slanted or bold slanted for all fonts that provide appropriate font shapes. The only prerequisite is that the corresponding |fd| file has to define the font shapes |scsl| resp.\ |scit| for slanted resp.\ italic small capitals.
